Package pathfinder

This package contains all classes related to the more specific case of finding the best path in a given grid. Thus, has the extension of EventSimulator, MainSimulator, the XML parser that reads XML file and gets all constants needed for the simulation, ReadFile, and the map itself and its constituents.

It also contains subclasses of Event that implement its central method.

Lastly, contains Individual that contains all information that represent each individual and all methods that it requires to move and update.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Grid
    This interface provides a service to be used to get valid segments where individual can move given its current point in the map.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Death
    This class extends Event, providing a specific implementation of Event.doEvent(): removing a certain Individual from the alive Individual list.
    Grid2D
    This class implements Grid for a 2D map where Individuals can move.
    Individual
    This class stores everything that represents each individual, and implements methods needed to update its comfort, number of segments traversed, cost, etc.
    IndividualComparatorByComfort
    This Comparator is used to compare Individuals by their Comforts, to sort the alive Individuals and see if the one with greater comfort is better than the best one stored in MainSimulator.
    IndividualComparatorByPath
    This Comparator is used to compare Individuals by their Paths, to check whether the best Individual stored in MainSimulator is worse than the best one alive.
    MainSimulator
    This class represents the extension of applied to the specific case of best path finding simulation.
    Move
    This class extends Event, providing a specific implementation of Event.doEvent(): moving a certain Individual in the provided grid.
    Observation
    This class extends Event, providing a specific implementation of Event.doEvent(): making an observation about present instant.
    Point
    This class represents a Point in the grid, with fields x and y being its coordinates.
    ReadFile
    This class gets data from the XML, giving it later to the simulator and to the grid.
    Reproduction
    This class extends Event, providing a specific implementation of Event.doEvent(): reproducing a certain Individual and adding the newborn to the list of alive Individuals.
    Segment
    This class represents a segment between two Point.
